ud8.6:1.3: pāṭaligāmiyā → pāṭaligāmikā (dn16:56 [Mahāparinibbānasutta/5. Dussīlaādīnava]) | kho → ko nu kho (sabbattha) | māpentī”ti → māpetīti (sabbattha)
ud8.6:2.2: sabbasantharisanthataṁ → sabbasanthariṁ santhataṁ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | udakamaṇiko patiṭṭhāpito → udakamaṇikaṁ patiṭṭhāpitaṁ (sya-all)
